statements: DELETE FROM promotional_data WHERE campaign_name = 'Fall Sale';
DELETE FROM promotional_data WHERE id = 1 AND campaign_id = 100;
DELETE FROM promotional_data WHERE redemption_count > 50 OR redemption_expiry < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM discount_codes WHERE discount_code_id = 101 AND discount_value > 50.0
DELETE FROM campaign_metrics WHERE clicks < 100 AND conversions > 10
DELETE FROM discount_codes WHERE code_id = 100 AND start_date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM coupons WHERE coupon_id = 500 AND discount = 10.00;
DELETE FROM campaigns WHERE name = 'Summer Sale';
